Reference

All functions

calc_aucs()

Calculate AUROC and AUPRC

change_to_num()

Change columns to numeric if possible

check_group()

Check group

createGroupedDataPartition()

Split into train and test set while splitting by group

define_cv()

Define Cross-Validation Scheme and Training Parameters

find_permuted_auc()

Get permuted AUROC difference for a single feature (or group of features)

flatten_corr_mat()

Flatten correlation matrix to pairs

get_caret_dummyvars_df()

Get dummyvars dataframe (i.e. design matrix)

get_caret_processed_df()

Get preprocessed dataframe for continuous variables

get_corr_feats()

Identify correlated features

get_feature_importance()

Get feature importance using permutation method

get_hyperparams_from_df()

Split hyperparameters dataframe into named lists for each parameter

get_hyperparams_list()

Set hyperparameters based on ML method and dataset characteristics

get_performance_tbl()

Get model performance metrics as a one-row tibble

get_seeds_trainControl()

Get seeds for caret::trainControl

get_tuning_grid()

Generate the Tuning Grid for Tuning Hyperparameters

groupKMultiFolds()

Splitting into folds for cross-validation when using groups

group_correlated_features()

Group correlated features

mutate_all_types()

Mutate all columns with type.convert

otu_large

Large OTU abundance dataset

otu_med_results

Results from running the pipline with rpart2 on otu_medium

otu_medium

Medium-sized OTU abundance dataset

otu_mini

Mini OTU abundance dataset

otu_mini_cv2

2-fold cross validation on train_data_mini

otu_mini_cv2_grp

2-fold cross validation on train_data_mini with grouped features

otu_mini_results1

Results from running the pipline with L2 logistic regression on otu_mini

otu_mini_results1_grp

Results from running the pipline with L2 logistic regression on otu_mini with feature grouping

otu_mini_results2

Results from running the pipline with random forest on otu_mini

otu_mini_results3

Results from running the pipline with svmRadial on otu_mini

otu_mini_results4

Results from running the pipline with xbgTree on otu_mini

otu_mini_results5

Results from running the pipline with rpart2 on otu_mini

otu_sm_cv5

5-fold cross validation on train_data_sm

otu_small

Small OTU abundance dataset

preprocess_data()

Preprocess data prior to running machine learning

process_cat_feats()

Process categorical features

process_cont_feats()

Preprocess continuous features

process_novar_feats()

Process features with no variation

rm_corr_feats()

Remove correlated features

rm_missing_outcome()

Remove missing outcome values

run_ml()

Run the machine learning pipeline

set_hparams_regLogistic()

Set hyperparameters for logistic regression models

setup_parallel()

Register a cluster for parallel processing

split_outcome_features()

Split dataset into outcome and features

stop_parallel()

Unregsiter a parallel processing cluster

test_data_mini

A test data partition from otu_mini

test_data_sm

A test data partition from otu_small

train_data_mini

A training data partition from otu_mini

train_data_sm

Small training dataset

trained_model_mini

A trained model from L2 logistic regression on train_data_mini

trained_model_sm1

A trained model from L2 logistic regression on train_data_sm
